20110106191742.000|20110106191743.000|CC1|VEHICLES BUT THE STATE AGENCIES 
20110106191743.000|20110106191747.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN ADVISED TO NOT DELIVER
20110106191747.000|20110106191749.000|CC1|OR OPEN ANY MAIL.               
20110106191749.000|20110106191750.000|CC1|WHAT ARE YOUR THOUGHTS?         
20110106191750.000|20110106191751.000|CC1|>> THE FIRST STEP FOR           
20110106191751.000|20110106191753.000|CC1|AUTHORITIES IS TO ENSURE THERE  
20110106191753.000|20110106191759.000|CC1|AREN'T ANY DIGSAL ADDITIONAL    
20110106191759.000|20110106191801.000|CC1|PACKAGES AND TO NOT OPEN

20110106191801.000|20110106191804.000|CC1|WHAT YOU'RE GOING TO SEE QUICKLY
20110106191804.000|20110106191805.000|CC1|IS AN EXAMINATION OF THE        
20110106191805.000|20110106191807.000|CC1|REMNANTS OF THE DEVICES THAT    
20110106191807.000|20110106191808.000|CC1|EXPLODED AND SEE IF THERE'S     
20110106191808.000|20110106191810.000|CC1|ANYTHING TELL TALE THAT CAN COME
20110106191810.000|20110106191812.000|CC1|OUT OF THAT EXAMINATION ONCE

20110106191813.000|20110106191816.000|CC1|AREA AND BE HIGHLY CONFIDENT

20110106191817.000|20110106191819.000|CC1|EXPLOSIVE DEVICES NEARBY.       
20110106191819.000|20110106191820.000|CC1|STEP ONE IS TO SECURE THE       
20110106191820.000|20110106191821.000|CC1|PERIMETER AND ENSURE THERE ARE  
20110106191821.000|20110106191823.000|CC1|NO OTHER DEVICES.               
20110106191823.000|20110106191825.000|CC1|STEP TWO IS TO IDENTIFY WHAT WAS
20110106191825.000|20110106191826.000|CC1|BEHIND THIS, WHAT TYPE MUCH     
20110106191826.000|20110106191827.000|CC1|DEVICE AND WHETHER OR NOT THAT  
20110106191827.000|20110106191830.000|CC1|CAN LEAD THEM IN ONE DIRECTION  
20110106191830.000|20110106191830.000|CC1|IN THE INVESTIGATION.           
20110106191830.000|20110106191834.000|CC1|>> ROGER, ACCORDING TO WBAL TV, 
20110106191834.000|20110106191837.000|CC1|THE TWO PACKAGES EXPLODED IN    
20110106191837.000|20110106191838.000|CC1|THIS MAIL ROOM, THE SOURCE SAID 
20110106191838.000|20110106191840.000|CC1|WHEN THE PACKAGES WERE OPENED IN
20110106191840.000|20110106191842.000|CC1|THE MAIL ROOMS OF THE BUILDING,

20110106191845.000|20110106191847.000|CC1|SCARE WITH CARGO PLANES, WE ALL 
20110106191847.000|20110106191849.000|CC1|START TO ASK THE QUESTION, ARE

20110106191926.000|20110106191929.000|CC1|PACKAGE DELIVERY SYSTEM,        
20110106191929.000|20110106191931.000|CC1|SCREENING IS VERY, VERY         
20110106191931.000|20110106191931.000|CC1|DIFFICULT.

20110106191941.000|20110106191943.000|CC1|OF SENSE.

20110106191944.000|20110106191945.000|CC1|LEVELS.

20110106192529.000|20110106192531.000|CC1|PRINTS, NOT JUST PHYSICAL       
20110106192531.000|20110106192533.000|CC1|FINGERPRINTS BUT THE ABILITY OF 
20110106192533.000|20110106192535.000|CC1|THE PERSON WHO PUT THE DEVICES  
20110106192535.000|20110106192536.000|CC1|TOGETHER AND WHAT DOES THAT     
20110106192536.000|20110106192538.000|CC1|SUGGEST ABOUT THE PERSON'S      
20110106192538.000|20110106192539.000|CC1|PROFILE AND OBVIOUSLY THEIR     
20110106192539.000|20110106192541.000|CC1|MOTIVE IS WHAT WE'RE TRYING TO  
20110106192541.000|20110106192543.000|CC1|GET TOO BEFORE ANYONE ELSE GETS 
20110106192543.000|20110106192545.000|CC1|HURT ON ANYTHING LIKE THIS.     
20110106192545.000|20110106192547.000|CC1|>> CLINT, I DON'T WANT TO       
20110106192547.000|20110106192550.000|CC1|SPECULATE TOO FAR OVER WHAT IS  
20110106192550.000|20110106192552.000|CC1|REASONABLE HERE BUT YOU AND I

20110106192553.000|20110106192556.000|CC1|AND INCIDENTS WHERE PEOPLE

20110106192559.000|20110106192600.000|CC1|TERRITORY TO EITHER OF US.      
20110106192600.000|20110106192603.000|CC1|BUT YOU DO WONDER TO YOUR POINT 
20110106192603.000|20110106192606.000|CC1|WHETHER IT'S TEENAGERS OR SOME  
20110106192606.000|20110106192608.000|CC1|DIS GRUNTLED FORMER EMPLOYEE,   
20110106192608.000|20110106192610.000|CC1|WHY PEOPLE ACT OUT IN THIS WAY
